Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 
Important Announcements
Located minutes from Historic Downton Charleston as well as area beaches. 
Nestled just minutes from the cobblestone streets of historic downtown Charleston and the sun-kissed area beaches, 
 Holiday Inn Express is your perfect launchpad for Lowcountry adventures.

Begin your day with a hearty hot breakfast—fluffy eggs, sizzling sausage, golden waffles, and more—served fresh each morning to fuel your explorations. 
 Our Costa Express Coffee Bar keeps you energized 24/7 with rich, aromatic blends at your fingertips.

Stroll the iconic Battery, browse King Street’s boutiques and acclaimed restaurants, or venture to 
 Patriots Point for a taste of Charleston’s maritime legacy. Whether you're here for business with Boeing or leisure at the 
 South Carolina Aquarium, our inviting outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness center offer the perfect unwind.

With comfort, convenience, and Southern hospitality at every turn, your Charleston story starts here.

The highlights

Strategic location for contractors & project work

Close Proximity to Healthcare Facilities

Close to Downtown Charleston and Area Beaches

Hot Breakfast Now Available!

Holiday Festival of Lights

Strategic location for contractors & project work

Our strategic location is a significant advantage for business travelers, particularly project managers and contractors. The hotel offers convenient access to a variety of job sites across the Charleston area, minimizing commute times, leading to smoother project logistics and better overall time management for a busy project manager.
Call
 
 +1-912-2157709 Call
 
 +1-912-2157709 
Close Proximity to Healthcare Facilities

Our hotel is less than 3 miles to Bon Secours St. Francis Hospital and close to many other medical facilities. Special medical rates available, please call to inquire.
Call
 
 +1-843-402-8300 Call
 
 +1-843-402-8300 
Close to Downtown Charleston and Area Beaches

Ideally located in West Ashley, you are only a few minutes away from Downtown Charleston, area beaches and other attractions.

Hot Breakfast Now Available!

Enjoy a Hot Breakfast or a Grab & Go Breakfast at our newly renovated breakfast bar, including eggs, bacon, sausage, biscuits & gravy, fruit cups, yogurt, pastries, cereal, oatmeal, milk, and juice.
Call
 
 +1-843-4028300 Call
 
 +1-843-4028300 
Holiday Festival of Lights

A favorite holiday, the James Island Festival of Lights, will be happening from November to December 2021. This is a remarkable event that features almost two million sparkling lights. This is considered the most popular event in Charleston, open for nightly admission.

FAQs for Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526
Does Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 have a pool? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 has an outdoor pool.
How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 for hotel guests.
Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
No, pets are not allowed at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526.
Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 have a restaurant on site? 
No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526.
Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526.
When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.On weekends, breakfast is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526.
What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526? 
Check-in at Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Holiday Inn Express Charleston US Hwy 17 & I-526 offers free WiFi!
